name: Space Defence (itch) (LenSJ)
description:
A space tower defence game. You must survive all the waves to save the Earth from its DOOM. Shoot Meteorites and Aliens coming to destroy the earth, buy item to help you of this mission. Good luck Player, you will need it.

Key Features:

-Buy and Place Weapons

-Shoot the main Weapon

-Waves Stages

The bitbucket:

https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/gulayev-han-jox-gaw5/src/master/

Release notes:

-ver 1.0 full release

Credits:

-Artem Gulyaev

-Geumseong Han

-Lenny Steve Jox

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
